name: Astro Combat
description:
A homage to classic space shoot-em ups. Alien invaders are advancing into your solar system, it's up to you to defend it! Pilot your ship to weave through the endless field of projectiles and find the right moment to shoot the enemy ships down!

Controls:

  • Move - Arrow Keys
  • Shoot - Space Bar

Technologies used:

  • Java using LibGDX

Other programs used:

  • Music: LMMS
  • Sound Effects: LMMS and freesound.org
